async function test () {
	for await (let a of b) {
	}
	for (let c of d) {
	}
}
/**************************************************/
async function test(){for await(let a of b){}for(let c of d){}}
/**************************************************/
async function test (  )
{
	for await ( let a of b )
	{
	}
	for ( let c of d )
	{
	}
}
